title: Victoria Beckham's surprising secret to healthy lifestyle is red wine and tequila
text:

Victoria Beckham's beauty is envied by many and now she has shared her beauty secrets.

The fashion designer, 45, lifted the lid on how she achieves her radiant complexion and svelte figure during a segment on This Morning on Tuesday.

Opening up on her regime - which includes enjoying lots of booze - the brunette told: "I try to be really really healthy, I expect a lot of myself and my body.

"I have four kids and work a lot, I try to be healthy, fresh fish, fresh vegetables, fruit and I drink a lot of water.

"I am not saying I’m not fun, I am known to drink a few tequilas and a few red wines, it’s that balance. Working out, but having fun is also super important."

(Image: AFP/Getty Images)

Victoria also discussed her advice for achieving a glowing visage.

The Wannabe hitmaker advised: "Definitely take make-up off every night before bed, use a really good moisturiser that works for your skin type and stay hydrated!"

She admitted: "I haven’t always had good skin, I pay a lot of attention to my skin, not just on my skin, eating healthy as well and drinking water… basic things that make a difference!

(Image: Youtube)

"Using a good moisturiser, making sure my skin is hydrated and changing it up as well, I think is important."

The stylish star also touched on ageing as, she shared: "I am fine with growing older, I’m not trying to look any younger at all, I want to look good for my age!

"I want to look the best version of myself, I want to look after what I have. I don’t want to change anything, I’m OK with that, I like how older feels, I am OK how it looks, but I am not OK with how it sounds!"

(Image: WireImage)

Accomplished beauty Victoria also spoke about juggling working life alongside being a parent to children Brooklyn, 20, Romeo, 17, Cruz, 14, and Harper, eight - who she shares with footballer beau David Beckham.

She said: "I like to read, when I get home end of night, had dinner, kids in bed, i just like to relax and read, just really hang out with my family, spend quality time with the family."
description: The former Spice Girl credits her age-defying looks to booze as well as a healthy balanced diet
